title: Evil and the senses: French cinema of transgression
abstractText:
The proposal is to complete the research for and writing a book on French cinema and transgression. The book focuses on the work of filmmakers who, challenging spectator's expectations as well as established filmmaking conventions, as the twenty-first century downed, set out to explore anew cinema's power to disturb and evoke the repressed, the abject and the taboo.
To study these films is to engage with fundamental issues on filmmaking and in film theory and criticism (art and transgression, film form and the culture of shock), as well as consider the way French cinema addresses themes that are central to the definitions of contemporary identities (history and representation, identity and difference, colonial legacies).
